simplified: 牵马到河易，强马饮水难

pronunciation.pinyin: qiān mǎ dào hé yì , qiǎng mǎ yǐn shuǐ nán
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: qian1 ma3 dao4 he2 yi4 , qiang3 ma3 yin3 shui3 nan2

details.simplified: 牵马到河易，强马饮水难
details.traditional: 牽馬到河易，強馬飲水難

meanings.value: You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make him drink.
